mapper.insert: insert into product values( product_seq.nextVal, #{productname}, #{price}, #{content}, #{productimage_path}, sysdate, #{productquantity} )
mapper.update: update product set productimage_path=#{productimage_path} where productnum=#{productnum}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product
WHERE UPPER(productname) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{title}||'%')
